Module grupo25_projeto

Package blackjack

  • Interface Summary
    Interface Description
    GameMode
    This is an interface for the game mode in question (interactive, simulation or debug)
    GameState
    This is an interface for the game state (for example for the betting stage or the side stage, where side rules apply)
  • Class Summary
    Class Description
    AceFiveStrategy
    this class is a subclass of the BettingStrategy class and has the purpose of housing the ace five strategy
    BasicStrategy
    this class has the purpose of housing the basic strategy
    BettingState
    This class uses elements of the interface class GameState and in order to implement the state of the game where the player has to make their bet
    BettingStrategy
    The class BettingStrategy is an abstract class that serves as a superclass of the AceFive and the Standard Betting Strategies
    blackjack
    This class implements the main method of the blackjack game
    Card
    This class houses the cards used to play blackjack
    Dealer
    Dealer is a subclass of the User calls thats aims to house the Dealer objects of the blackjack game
    DealingState
    This class uses elements of the interface class GameState in order to implement the dealing state
    DebugMode
    The class DebugMode uses elements of the interface class of the GameMode class and has the purpose of housing objects related to an iteration of the debug mode
    Deck
    Class that houses all Deck objects (that compose the Shoe)
    DoubleState
    This class uses elements of the interface class Game state in order to implement the double state
    game
    This class houses game objects which are iterations of the blackjack game
    Hand
    This class houses all Hand objects related to the hand of a user (dealer or player)
    HiLoStrategy
    Class HiLoStrategy is a subclass of the class BasicStrategy that allows for the implementation of the Hi-lo strategy
    InterfaceMode
    Class InterfaceMode uses elements of the interface class GameMode that allows for the implementation of the interface (interactive) mode
    jackblack
    This class is used as the main class for the blackjack application
    Player
    The class Player is a subclass of the class User that is used to implement Player objects
    PlayingState
    This class uses elements of the interface class Game state in order to implement the playing state
    Shoe
    The class Shoe is used in order to house Shoe objects
    SidesState
    This class uses elements of the interface class GameState and in order to implement the side state of the game (immediately after the deal command)
    SimulationMode
    Class SimulationMode uses elements of the interface class GameMode that allows for the implementation of the simulation mode
    SplittingState
    This class uses elements of the interface class GameState and in order to implement the splitting state of the game
    StandardBetting
    The StandardBetting class is a subclass of the BettingStrategy class and is used in order to implement the standard betting strategy
    User
    User is an abstract class used to implement each party in a blackjack game
  • Enum Summary
    Enum Description
    Choice
    Choices that can be made
    RankType
    Enumerates all the possible card ranks with the corresponding value and name's abbreviation
    SuitType
    Enumerates all the possible card suits with the corresponding name's abbreviation
